_meanings:
{@--2@} The 15th day
of the moon's age on which she
rises one digit less than full, when
the gods and manes receive oblations
with favour; personified as a 
goddess or worshipped in the 
Rājasūya sacrifice ({#kalAhInacaMdravatI#} 
{#SuklacaturdaSIyutapUrRimAtiTiH#}); {#anumatyE havirazwAkapAlaM#}
{#puroqASa nirvapati#} <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 86-87</ls>.
